content: X-MW MX Wire hanger system Wire hanger system for spiral HVAC ducting and lighting applications, installed using battery-actuated fastening tools ### Categories: Home > Products > Modular support systems > Wire suspension system- - - ### FEATURES:Features Shorter installation time – wire suspensions are a faster alternative to threaded rod Easier to adjust – self-closing wire lock can be adjusted tool-free, making leveling, retrofitting and long drop lengths much simpler Aesthetics – wire rope suspension is a discreet installation method for exposed building services and open soffits Combustion-free operation – no gas cans or powder cartridges to store and dispose of and no certification required when used with fully electric BX fastening tools, Can be fastened while standing on the floor using the BX pole tool - safer method of installation avoiding lifts and ladders Applications Suspending spiral HVAC duct from concrete, wood and metal deck Suspending electrical lighting from the ceiling Suspending security attachments (secondary attachment point to work if first attachment point fails) Up to 30 lbs (13.5 kg) allowable load values Suitable for use in dry, indoor environments only For approval or certificate information, please see individual items. ### TECHNICAL DATA: Application: HVAC connections Material: Carbon steel For use with (tools): BX 3 Technical Data | Application | HVAC connections | Material | Carbon steel | For use with (tools) | BX 3 | Base materials | Concrete, Steel | Corrosion protection | Galvanic zinc plated | Environmental Conditions | Dry indoor | Product Class | Ultimate ### ITEMS- 2325729 - Wire hanger system X-MW MX L 20ft/6m - Package Size 20 pc - 2325727 - Wire hanger system X-MW MX L 6ft - Package Size 30 pc - 2325728 - Wire hanger system X-MW MX L 10ft/3m - Package Size 30 pc
